dcterms:description: The ISPRS Potsdam dataset is a remote sensing research dataset that describes the environment and surroundings in and around the city. It includes 38 image patches, each consisting of a 6000 Ã— 6000 resolution true orthophoto (TOP) and its corresponding digital surface model (DSM). The dataset contains six common land cover classes: impervious surfaces, buildings, low vegetation, trees, cars, and clutter/background.
dcterms:title: ISPRS Potsdam Dataset
